spells.name: Bless
spells.description: Allies gain +1 on attack rolls and saves against fear.

spells.name: Cause Fear
spells.description: One creature of 5 HD or less flees for 1d4 rounds.

spells.name: Command
spells.description: One subject obeys selected command for 1 round.

spells.name: Comprehend Languages
spells.description: You understand all spoken and written languages.

spells.name: Detect Chaos/Evil/Good/Law
spells.description: Reveals creatures, spells, or objects of selected alignment.

spells.name: Endure Elements
spells.description: Exist comfortably in hot or cold regions.

spells.name: Protection from Chaos/Evil/Good/Law
spells.description: +2 to AC and saves, plus additional protection against selected alignment.

spells.name: Sleep
spells.description: Puts 4 HD of creatures into magical slumber.
